sentences.en: Does the farmer return strew straw to the field?
sentences.cn: 农民会把稻草当成肥料施还给土地 么 ?

sentences.en: Get up, or I'll strew your brains upon the grass.
sentences.cn: 起来, 否则我就把你的脑浆洒在这草地上.

sentences.en: How dare you even think that they Should streak the windows or strew the floors!
sentences.cn: 你怎么敢认为她们应该做装点布置窗户和地板的工作呢!

sentences.en: Pour honey and strew white sesame.
sentences.cn: 淋上蜂蜜,撒上白芝麻即可.

sentences.en: Reluctantly Suzuki obeys and, with her mistress , proceeds to strew the blossoms all over the room.
sentences.cn: 铃木不情愿地照办了, 她们两人把花撒遍整个房间.

sentences.en: Requiescat Matthew Arnold Strew on her roses, roses And never a spray of yew.
sentences.cn: 安魂曲马修·阿诺德用玫瑰花 、 玫瑰花覆盖伊,却决不要一枝紫杉!

sentences.en: Shells of all shapes and sizes strew the long narrow beach.
sentences.cn: 各种各样的贝壳点缀着狭长的海滩.

sentences.en: The chandelier falls and its pieces strew the floor; pick them up again piece by piece.
sentences.cn: 这时一盏枝形吊灯掉在地上,又是一地碎片, 于是又得一点一点地拾起来.

sentences.en: The Jews are broken and gone ; the fragments of their people strew the world.
sentences.cn: 犹太人已经支离破碎、风飘云散了. 他们的人七零八落地散到世界各地.

sentences.en: The racoons knock over the rubbish bins in search of food, and strew the contents all over the ground.
sentences.cn: 浣熊为了找吃的弄翻了垃圾箱，垃圾撒的到处都是。

sentences.en: Their custom is to strew flowers over the graves.
sentences.cn: 他们的风俗是在坟墓上撒花.

sentences.en: Though the work was dull and strew, they plodded away at it in earnest.
sentences.cn: 虽说工作既单调又繁重, 但他们依然兢兢业业.

sentences.en: Yes, strew is being turned into biofuel to power cars.
sentences.cn: 是的, 草莓可以做成生物燃料发动汽车.

trans.tran_en: to scatter things around a large area

trans.tran_cn: 撒在…上，散落于，点缀，撒满
